basicInfo.name: Ruri
basicInfo.flavor: Ruri earned a hefty bounty for capturing Joker. She used the money to cure her sister, and donated the rest to charity. She later learned of Joker's escape.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Point Blank Barrage
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 35% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 42% of Magic Attack to each attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.

Skill 2.name: Fire Support
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 130% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 155% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Bounty Hunter
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Heals HP equal to 95% of the caster's Magic Attack upon using a skill 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 29%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 39% Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Sieg, members of the Holy Cross Crusaders, Orly, Aquila, professional mindsets, optimism, cheerfulness
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Joker, stagnation, darkness, hospitals
profile.story: Ruri grew up an orphan in the slums, but she hasn't let that hold her back. She became a bounty hunter to care for her frail younger sister.

basicInfo.name: Ruri
basicInfo.flavor: Despite all her efforts, Ruri couldn't cure her sister's illness herself — she could only stabilize it. When she learned about the bounty on Joker, she began to hunt him down.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Point Blank Barrage
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 67% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 32% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 67% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Fire Support
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 115% of Magic Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Bounty Hunter
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Heals HP equal to 85% of the caster's Magic Attack upon using a skill 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 19%.

profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Joker, stagnation, darkness, hospitals
